lead_paragraph: ISAACSON--Leonard A, 88, passed away after a brief illness on February 21, 2016. Devoted husband to the late Katy, beloved father of Deborah and Jim, Joel and Alissa, Laurence and Alex, loving son to the late Jack and Lillian, caring brother to the late Rhoda; cherished grandfather and loving friend to so many. He was a distinguished lawyer, a competitive sportsman and a loving person. He also continued and enhanced the family tradition of devotion to AHRC NYC. Services will be held on Wednesday, February 24 at 10:30am at "The Riverside," 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue. Donations in his memory may be made to AHRC NYC Foundation, 83 Maiden Lane, NY, NY 10038. 1/3
